properties.areaDesc: Sodus Bay to Mexico Bay NY
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 6 at 3:56AM EST until February 8 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds to 30 knots and waves 6 to 9 feet.

* WHERE...The nearshore waters of Lake Ontario from Sodus Bay to
Mexico Bay.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 6 AM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Winds and/or waves will cause hazardous conditions
that could capsize or damage small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM EST SATURDAY
